title: White House Clarifies Bidenâ€™s Coal Remarks After Outrage From Manchin
description: President Biden drew backlash from Senator Joe Manchin III, a fellow Democrat, for saying that an energy transition would mean shutting down coal plants.
dc:creator: Alan Rappeport and Emily Cochrane
media:credit: Sarah Silbiger for The New York Times
media:description: Senator Joe Manchin III criticized President Biden for saying that coal mines and plants should be shut down in favor of wind and solar plants.
